snippet: Democratic and Republican leaders said gun legislation had proved extraordinarily complex, given a historic outpouring of responses from opponents and supporters of gun control.
abstract: Legislative task force in Connecticut release competing gun-safety agendas in response to massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary School; despite 16 cited areas of agreement, several partisan differences remain; say legislation has proved complex and contentious, given outpouring of response from critics and supporters of new gun-control measures.
lead_paragraph: Democratic and Republican leaders said gun legislation had proved extraordinarily complex, given a historic outpouring of responses from opponents and supporters of gun control.

headline.seo: In Connecticut, Gun Safety Task Force Results in Two Conflicting Agendas
headline.main: 2 Conflicting Legislative Agendas Arise From Gun Safety Task Force in Connecticut
headline.print_headline: 2 Conflicting Legislative Agendas Arise From Gun Safety Task Force in Connecticut
